products.title: Skye Lava Red (Blackout)
products.description: The elegant silver or white fascia and side channels house roller fabric discreetly within the roof window. Skye roof blinds have been designed to fit velux, rooflite, keylite, fakro and dakstra roof windows. Offering optimum light control each blind can be positioned effortlessly to sit at any desired point within the side channels. All parts are supplied to fit the blind direct to your choice of branded skylight window.

products.title: Light Beige (1085) (Blackout)
products.description: The velux blackout blind offers light proof seal for total darkness anytime. It is ideal in bedrooms, where you need complete light control to ensure a good nights sleep or restful nap during the day. Total blackout - best on the market. Oeko-tex certified. Stepless positioning. Slim design integrates perfectly with your roof window. Available in 24 colours. Installs in minutes. Buy made to measure light beige (1085) (blackout) velux blackout roller blinds from soeasy blinds.
